content.question: Giovanni Battista Gaulli’s Triumph of the Name of Jesus can be linked to Michelangelo’s Sistine Chapel ceiling frescoes through the two works'

choices.label: blending of painted and stucco figures
division of a narrative into separate episodes
blurred distinction between painting and architecture

content.answer: blurred distinction between painting and architecture

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain the influence of a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) on other artistic production within or across cultures.
